colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES PA 'DI NI AA MNAN TA BLA MA MDZAD PA SMRAS PA'O, ,RGAN PO DGU SBYOR NI, BONG NAG SPRU NAG MTSUR NAG SHU DAG ,SHING KUN NAG MU ZI NAG GLA RTZIN GU GUL NAG ,STAG SHA SBYAR BA'I NAG PO DGU SBYOR 'DI, ,SNAG TSAL GSOL BA'I RIL BU LUS LA BCANGS, ,'GRO BA'I NANG DANG GRIB RNAMS 'GO MA 'GYUR, ,'UNG BAS BDUG NA SA BDAG KLU GNYAN DANG, GDUG RTZUB RGYAL 'GONG RIMS DAL DANG YAMS SOGS, ,NAD DANG GDON DANG BGEGS RNAMS BSRUNG ZHING 'JOMS, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
